Package.Name: Habistack Launch Pad
Package.Description: A Habistack launch pad that consists of a data dashboard (GitHub fork) and Freeboard dashboard (NPM) auto-populated with emulated data or device data from multiple APIs.

Basic.Name: Habistack Launch Pad
Basic.Description: A Habistack launch pad that consists of a data dashboard (GitHub fork) and Freeboard dashboard (NPM) auto-populated with emulated data or device data from multiple APIs.
